rules_text: Tap target attacking or blocking creature. Prevent all combat damage it would deal this turn. It doesn’t untap during its controller’s next untap step.
notes: fluffy: it doesn’t deal —> prevent all combat damage it would deal (http://magiccards.info/query?q=o%3A%22it+doesn%27t+deal%22&v=card&s=edition), it’s —> its
